content: the great star pumpkins are set of crochet amigurumi pumpkins that feature the star stitch these pumpkins come in three different sizes and use a combination of star stitches and single crochets to create some amazing texture these beauties look complex but are simple to make and will be beautiful fall decor for years to come in addition to yarn and a crochet hook you will need a stem and filling of choice i have a link in this pattern will a roundup of stem ideas
